title: Sepsis Awareness Month: Vivace Health Solutions and ViMedicus Form Partnership
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 2:13 PM   ViMedicus, Inc. 
CARDIFF, Calif. & CHICAGO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Vivace Health Solutions, Inc. and ViMedicus, Inc. announce a new partnership to accelerate the early detection of sepsis and enable healthcare providers to deploy more timely and appropriate interventions. Using this new customizable, adaptive software offering, healthcare organizations will be able to alert clinicians at the earliest stages of potential sepsis cases and provide real-time guidance in monitoring and treatment. In the U.S. alone, there are over 200,000 deaths each year due to sepsis, with hospital admissions due to sepsis increasing three-fold over the past decade. September is Sepsis Awareness Month, sponsored by the Sepsis Alliance ( www.sepsis.org ), with the intent to raise awareness of this deadly and costly medical condition. 
“Unlike many other life-threatening conditions, sepsis can and should be eminently preventable,” says Stephen Wasko, President of ViMedicus. “Combining Vivace’s powerful real-time analytical tools with ViMedicus’ intuitive patient visualization and clinical workflow platform will allow clinicians unparalleled support in the treatment of sepsis.” 
“Although it has long been recognized that sepsis kills and disables millions and requires early suspicion and treatment for survival, mortality remains at 35-60%.” According to Tom Velez, CEO of Vivace, “The key to advancement will require world-class workflow and cognitive decision support tools that unleash the power of information. The integrated ViMedicus / Vivace Early Warning Response System (EWRS) will provide clinicians with the actionable intelligence needed to save lives.” 
About ViMedicus 
Founded in 2010, ViMedicus is an innovative healthcare team providing intuitive technology and coordinated care solutions that enable patients and providers to achieve their health goals. In today’s often fragmented healthcare environment, ViMedicus empowers providers to engage patients more effectively and efficiently. By actively listening to patients and clinicians, ViMedicus develops solutions that complement their existing lifestyles and workflows, improving outcomes, reducing risk, and lowering cost of care. Additional information about ViMedicus can be found by visiting www.vimedicus.com . 
About Vivace Health Solutions 
Vivace Health Solutions is a division of Computer Technology Associates (CTA), founded by its CEO, Dr. Tom Velez. Building on its legacy of fusing data from the VA and four military EMR systems to create a unified pharmacovigilance platform and military eye injury registry, Vivace develops artificial intelligence technologies that semantically fuse historical data from diverse medical records with real-time data to create the highest quality health records as a starting point. Applying evidence-based analytics, natural language processing, and machine learning to this rich data source, Vivace seeks to help clinicians take better care of patients, identify appropriate interventions, and save lives. Additional information about Vivace can be found by visiting www.vivacehealthsolutionsinc.com .
